ComicInfo.Title: Culmination; Dark Entry
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-24 07:44:40. [CVDB247508] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 01:11:47. [Issue ID 255680]

ComicInfo.Summary:
Culmination: Kohl fights the Dragon within his ring. Holly regains the use of her armor.
Dark Entry: Introduction of Maire Siddons (sorcery student) & Mark Quay (ex-soldier).
